TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Siulang, title = Siulang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Siulang} }

S.FORM: Siulang Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Siulang a niyaro', 29 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 113 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 108 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun91%, Paiwan1%, roma4%.

Siolang Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Siolang a niyaro', 29 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 113 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 108 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon91%, Paiwan1%, roma4%.
